response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, and I believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs, given its worth of $1,000,000 to you. Considering its unique features and benefits, I am extending an offer to sell it to you at a special price of $900,000. This represents a substantial saving compared to its intrinsic value and offers you an excellent opportunity to own a high-quality asset at a competitive rate.

Please let me know if this proposal meets your expectations and if you wish to proceed with the purchase. I am here to assist you throughout the process and answer any questions you might have.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 900000}
